name: Towering Temptation
description:
Inspired by popular genre of endless runners (in this case jumpers(?)). 

Jump, Bounce off the walls. Beat your highest scores!

Better looking assets are taken from royalty free, CC0. Most of the platforms made by me. 

It was a learning project for Unity 2D. Can't tell if I'd get back to it in the future. I'm leaving it 'as is' for now.
